de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures.Request

  • public class Request
extends Object
    Represents a HTTP request as received from a client
    Author:
    Deadmist

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request(InputStream in)
      Reads from an input stream and parses the data as a http request

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(InputStream in)
        throws IOException,
               RequestException
        Reads from an input stream and parses the data as a http request
        Parameters:
        in - Stream to read from
        Throws:
        IOException - Something went wrong reading the stream
        RequestException - The data could not be parsed as a valid http request

        public String getMethod()
        Returns the HTTP request method
        e.g. GET, HEAD
        Returns:

      • getUrl

        public String getUrl()
        Returns the requested URL, this includes the server address, port, protocol and path
        e.g. http://google.com/robot.txt
        Returns:
        the URL
